lines.text: The ship is now armed and preparing to explode. This will be a fairly large explosion, so you'd best keep back about 22 miles.
You want suck? I suck. You want blow? I blow. You want intellectual disputation? I got a big belch.

Chicken, chicken, squawk, oh bliss! Oh bleeding heck, this chicken's cold! What's this, some sort of low-calorie fob-off? Where's the steaming fat? Where's the hot running grease? This is no chicken - this is some dirty no-good health food!
